effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
